memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_POSITIONING_X
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeft relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem: [VIEW superview] attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeft multiplier: 1.0f constant: X]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_POSITIONING_LEADING
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeading relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem: [VIEW superview] attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeading multiplier: 1.0f constant: X]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_POSITIONING_Y
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeTop relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem: [VIEW superview] attribute: NSLayoutAttributeTop multiplier: 1.0f constant: Y]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_SETTING_WIDTH
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeWidth relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:nil attribute: NSLayoutAttributeNotAnAttribute multiplier: 1.0f constant: WIDTH]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_SETTING_HEIGHT
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeHeight relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:nil attribute: NSLayoutAttributeNotAnAttribute multiplier: 1.0f constant: HEIGHT]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_SETTING_MIN_WIDTH
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeWidth relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationGreaterThanOrEqual toItem:nil attribute: NSLayoutAttributeNotAnAttribute multiplier: 1.0f constant: WIDTH]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_SETTING_MIN_HEIGHT
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeHeight relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationGreaterThanOrEqual toItem:nil attribute: NSLayoutAttributeNotAnAttribute multiplier: 1.0f constant: HEIGHT]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_SETTING_MAX_WIDTH
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeWidth relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationLessThanOrEqual toItem:nil attribute: NSLayoutAttributeNotAnAttribute multiplier: 1.0f constant: WIDTH]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_SETTING_MAX_HEIGHT
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeHeight relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationLessThanOrEqual toItem:nil attribute: NSLayoutAttributeNotAnAttribute multiplier: 1.0f constant: HEIGHT]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_STRETCHING_H
memberdef.initializer: ^NSArray *(){VIEW_CLASS *_stretchview = VIEW; NSString *format = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"H:|-%d-[_stretchview]-%d-|", INDENT, INDENT]; NSArray *_tmparray = CONSTRAINTS(format, _stretchview); return _tmparray;}()

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_STRETCHING_V
memberdef.initializer: ^NSArray *(){VIEW_CLASS *_stretchview = VIEW; NSString *format = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"V:|-%d-[_stretchview]-%d-|", INDENT, INDENT]; NSArray *_tmparray = CONSTRAINTS(format, _stretchview); return _tmparray;}()

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_STRETCHING_PARTIAL_H
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem:VIEW attribute:NSLayoutAttributeWidth relatedBy:NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:[VIEW superview] attribute:NSLayoutAttributeWidth multiplier:(PERCENT) constant:0]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_STRETCHING_PARTIAL_V
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem:VIEW attribute:NSLayoutAttributeHeight relatedBy:NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:[VIEW superview] attribute:NSLayoutAttributeHeight multiplier:(PERCENT) constant:0]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_MATCHING_WIDTH
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeWidth relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:TOVIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeWidth multiplier: 1.0f constant:0]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_MATCHING_HEIGHT
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeHeight relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:TOVIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeHeight multiplier: 1.0f constant:0]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_CENTERING_H
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeCenterX relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem: [VIEW superview] attribute: NSLayoutAttributeCenterX multiplier: 1.0f constant: 0.0f]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_CENTERING_V
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeCenterY relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem: [VIEW superview] attribute: NSLayoutAttributeCenterY multiplier: 1.0f constant: 0.0f]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_LEFT
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeft relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem: [VIEW superview] attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeft multiplier: 1.0f constant: INDENT]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_TOP
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeTop relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem: [VIEW superview] attribute: NSLayoutAttributeTop multiplier: 1.0f constant: INDENT]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_LEADING
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeading relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem: [VIEW superview] attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeading multiplier: 1.0f constant: INDENT]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_RIGHT
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeRight relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem: [VIEW superview] attribute: NSLayoutAttributeRight multiplier: 1.0f constant: (-INDENT)]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_BOTTOM
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeBottom relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem: [VIEW superview] attribute: NSLayoutAttributeBottom multiplier: 1.0f constant: (-INDENT)]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_TRAILING
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeTrailing relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem: [VIEW superview] attribute: NSLayoutAttributeTrailing multiplier: 1.0f constant: (-INDENT)]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_PAIR_LEFT
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW2 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeft relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:VIEW1 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeft multiplier: 1.0f constant: INDENT]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_PAIR_TOP
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW2 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeTop relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:VIEW1 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeTop multiplier: 1.0f constant: INDENT]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_PAIR_LEADING
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW1 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeading relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:VIEW2 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeading multiplier: 1.0f constant: OFFSET]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_PAIR_RIGHT
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW2 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeRight relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:VIEW1 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeRight multiplier: 1.0f constant: (-INDENT)]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_PAIR_BOTTOM
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW2 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeBottom relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:VIEW1 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeBottom multiplier: 1.0f constant: (-INDENT)]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_PAIR_TRAILING
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW1 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeTrailing relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:VIEW2 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeTrailing multiplier: 1.0f constant: (-OFFSET)]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_PAIR_CENTERX
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW2 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeCenterX relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:VIEW1 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeCenterX multiplier: 1.0f constant: OFFSET]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_PAIR_CENTERY
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW2 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeCenterY relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:VIEW1 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeCenterY multiplier: 1.0f constant: OFFSET]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_STACKING_H
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW2 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeLeading relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:VIEW1 attribute:NSLayoutAttributeTrailing multiplier: 1.0f constant:(BUFFERPOINTS)]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_STACKING_V
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW2 attribute: NSLayoutAttributeTop relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:VIEW1 attribute:NSLayoutAttributeBottom multiplier: 1.0f constant:(BUFFERPOINTS)]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_SETTING_ASPECT
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeWidth relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationEqual toItem:VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeHeight multiplier:(ASPECT) constant: 0.0f]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_SETTING_MIN_ASPECT
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeWidth relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationGreaterThanOrEqual toItem:VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeHeight multiplier:(ASPECT) constant: 0.0f]

memberdef.name: CONSTRAINT_SETTING_MAX_ASPECT
memberdef.initializer: [NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem: VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeWidth relatedBy: NSLayoutRelationLessThanOrEqual toItem:VIEW attribute: NSLayoutAttributeHeight multiplier:(ASPECT) constant: 0.0f]

memberdef.name: LAYOUT_H
memberdef.initializer: INSTALL_CONSTRAINTS(DEFAULT_LAYOUT_PRIORITY, @"Create Row", CONSTRAINT_STACKING_H(VIEW1, VIEW2, OFFSET), CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_PAIR_CENTERY(VIEW1, VIEW2, 0))

memberdef.name: LAYOUT_V
memberdef.initializer: INSTALL_CONSTRAINTS(DEFAULT_LAYOUT_PRIORITY, @"Create Column", CONSTRAINT_STACKING_V(VIEW1, VIEW2, OFFSET), CONSTRAINT_ALIGNING_PAIR_CENTERX(VIEW1, VIEW2, 0))
